error.no_address_associated_with_domain:
There is no address associated with the host name.
Check your input and your internet connection then try again.

ping.title: Ping
ping.enter_a_domain_name_or_ip: Enter a domain name or IP address

error.please_enter_a_domain_name_or_ip: Please enter a domain name or IP address

error.impossible_to_start_the_sound_meter: Impossible to start the sound meter
error.no_sound_detected: No sound detected, check that the application has access to the microphone in the settings of your device.

roulette.title: Roulette
roulette.tap_to_roll_info: Tap the wheel to roll it

warning.you_cant_add_more_than_x_items: You can't have more than $numberOfItems items in the roulette.
warning.you_must_have_at_least_x_items: You must have at least $numberOfItems items in the roulette.
warning.you_must_enter_an_item_name: You must enter an item name.

error.min_must_be_lower_than_max: The minimum number must be lower than the maximum number.
error.min_and_max_must_be_between_x_and_y: The minimum and maximum numbers must be between $minNumberLimit and $maxNumberLimit.

randomcolor.title: Random color
randomcolor.hint: Tap the color to change it

error.invalid_passphrase: You may have entered a passphrase when your key is not encrypted, or vice versa
error.invalid_private_key: The key you provided is not a valid private key
error.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again

networkinfo.title: Network info
networkinfo.location_permission_required:
Location permission is required to get some WiFi info (this is an OS limitation).
You could get incorrect info if you don't grant it.
networkinfo.note_location_permission: Note: some information may be incorrect if you didn't grant precise location permission.

credits.app_license: The app is licensed under the $license license
